trends: There have been no other sightings in Wayne
This sighting has never been favorited.
divs: sighting detailswe where in southern mcclain county okla. i was a front seat passenger,we where traveling east, i saw something to our south out over a wheat field approximately 1\4 of a mile away, close to the back side of a large barn. it was no more than 7 to 10 foot up in the air it was flying west. i started taking pics,i told the driver to take the first road south, lets catch this thing.as it neared some trees it shot upward, and was behind the tree line from us,again lets catch this thing, which we tried, after that point it was entering the clouds it had to have been 1 to 1 1\2 miles above us.
Summary: witnessed ground level flight it started upword i sped towards it, went into high clouds second or two, no longer. i have pics.
